md:
giải nghĩa từ "roses" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

1. Rose (noun) - Hoa hồng
	* Meaning: A type of flowering plant with a sweet, pleasant smell.
	* Example sentence: "The garden was filled with beautiful roses."
	* Related words: flower, bloom, petal, thorn
	* Antonyms: weed, thistle

2. Rose (verb) - Tăng lên, leo lên
	* Meaning: To increase or go up in amount or level.
	* Example sentence: "The temperature rose quickly during the summer."
	* Related words: increase, climb, ascend, grow
	* Antonyms: decrease, fall, drop

3. Rose (past tense of "rise") - Đã tăng lên, đã leo lên
	* Meaning: To have increased or gone up in amount or level.
	* Example sentence: "The stock price rose sharply last year."
	* Related words: increased, climbed, ascended, grew
	* Antonyms: decreased, fell, dropped
html:
giải nghĩa từ "roses" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

  1. Rose (noun) - Hoa hồng

    • Meaning: A type of flowering plant with a sweet, pleasant smell.
    • Example sentence: "The garden was filled with beautiful roses."
    • Related words: flower, bloom, petal, thorn
    • Antonyms: weed, thistle

  2. Rose (verb) - Tăng lên, leo lên

    • Meaning: To increase or go up in amount or level.
    • Example sentence: "The temperature rose quickly during the summer."
    • Related words: increase, climb, ascend, grow
    • Antonyms: decrease, fall, drop

  3. Rose (past tense of "rise") - Đã tăng lên, đã leo lên

    • Meaning: To have increased or gone up in amount or level.
    • Example sentence: "The stock price rose sharply last year."
    • Related words: increased, climbed, ascended, grew
    • Antonyms: decreased, fell, dropped
